author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-92: bug fixes, and improve handling of updates (POST to the exact resource URL) vs. node creation (POST to an URL ending in /*, or POST to a non-existing URL). See createOrUpdateNodesFromRequest(...) for details.

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-92 : do not throw exceptions on invalid JCR path, declare that as a "resource not found" situation. Useful for microjax which uses /* to mean "create resource here".

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-92: send a 404 instead of doing default rendering if URL info includes a suffix, i.e. if resource was found higher in the tree than what the URL says

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-92 Avoid dot in POST URLs, microjax changes cause the URL to be cut at the dot position when POSTing
